cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuiki

sentence.kanji: ここは危険区域よ。
sentence.romaji: koko ha kiken kuiki yo
sentence.english: This is a danger zone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itami

sentence.kanji: 背中に痛みがあります。
sentence.romaji: senaka ni itami ga arimasu
sentence.english: I have a pain in my back.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iryou

sentence.kanji: 医療関係の仕事をしています。
sentence.romaji: iryou kankei no shigoto wo shite imasu
sentence.english: I work in healthcare.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chiryou

sentence.kanji: 今、歯を治療しています。
sentence.romaji: ima ha wo chiryou shite imasu
sentence.english: I'm having my teeth treated now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoujou

sentence.kanji: 医者に症状を説明したよ。
sentence.romaji: isha ni shoujou wo setsumei shita yo
sentence.english: I explained the symptoms to the doctor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touroku

sentence.kanji: 心理学の授業に登録しましたか。
sentence.romaji: shinrigaku no jugyou ni touroku shimashita ka
sentence.english: Have you registered for the psychology class?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuubyou

sentence.kanji: 知り合いが急病で倒れた。
sentence.romaji: shiriai ga kyuubyou de taoreta
sentence.english: An acquaintance of mine suddenly fell ill.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hirou

sentence.kanji: 部下が疲労で倒れたの。
sentence.romaji: buka ga hirou de taoreta no
sentence.english: My subordinate collapsed from fatigue.

cards.english: generation of heat, get a fever
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatsunetsu

sentence.kanji: 娘が突然、発熱したんだ。
sentence.romaji: musume ga totsuzen hatsunetsu shita n da
sentence.english: My daughter suddenly developed a fever.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatsumei

sentence.kanji: 彼は偉大な発明王です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha idai na hatsumeiou desu
sentence.english: He's a great master of invention.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toujou

sentence.kanji: 彼女の登場で会場は盛り上がったね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no toujou de kaijou ha moriagata ne
sentence.english: The audience got excited as she appeared.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sumu

sentence.kanji: 山の空気は澄んでいますね。
sentence.romaji: yama no kuuki ha sunde imasu ne
sentence.english: The mountain air is clear.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itamu

sentence.kanji: 虫歯がずきずき痛みます。
sentence.romaji: mushiba ga zukizuki itamimasu
sentence.english: I have a throbbing toothache.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naguru

sentence.kanji: 彼は思わず友人を殴ったの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha omowazu yuujin wo naguta no
sentence.english: He hit his friend without thinking.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osaeru

sentence.kanji: 彼は怒りを抑えていたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ikari wo osaete ita no
sentence.english: He was restraining his anger.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinkou

sentence.kanji: 信仰は心の支えです。
sentence.romaji: shinkou ha kokoro no sasae desu
sentence.english: Faith uplifts the spirit.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's demukae

sentence.kanji: 空港へ彼女を出迎えに行きました。
sentence.romaji: kuukou he kanojo wo demukae ni ikimashita
sentence.english: I went to the airport to pick her up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mukae

sentence.kanji: 駅まで迎えに来て下さい。
sentence.romaji: eki made mukae ni kite kudasai
sentence.english: Please come pick me up at the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryou

sentence.kanji: 彼は会社の寮に住んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaisha no ryou ni sunde imasu
sentence.english: He lives in the company dormitory.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kangei

sentence.kanji: 温かい歓迎を受けました。
sentence.romaji: atatakai kangei wo ukemashita
sentence.english: I received a warm welcome.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ishi

sentence.kanji: 医師に入院を勧められたの。
sentence.romaji: ishi ni nyuuin wo susumerareta no
sentence.english: The doctor suggested I admit myself to a hospital.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuse

sentence.kanji: 爪をかむ癖は直した方がいい。
sentence.romaji: tsume wo kamu kuse ha naoshita hou ga ii
sentence.english: You should stop the habit of biting your nails.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's geri

sentence.kanji: 古いお寿司を食べて下痢をしてしまったんだ。
sentence.romaji: furui osushi wo tabete geri wo shite shimata n da
sentence.english: I got diarrhea from eating old sushi.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akai

sentence.kanji: 赤いバラを買いました。
sentence.romaji: akai bara wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought a red rose.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanoshimu

sentence.kanji: 今日は一人の時間を楽しみたい。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha hitori no jikan wo tanoshimitai
sentence.english: Today I would like to enjoy some time to myself.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iro

sentence.kanji: すてきな色のセーターですね。
sentence.romaji: suteki na iro no se-ta- desu ne
sentence.english: That sweater is a wonderful color.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanoshii

sentence.kanji: 彼はとても楽しい人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha totemo tanoshii hito desu
sentence.english: He's very fun to be with.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiiroi

sentence.kanji: 彼女に黄色いバラを買いました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ni kiiroi bara wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought her a yellow rose.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaeru

sentence.kanji: 旅行の日程を変えました。
sentence.romaji: ryokou no nitei wo kaemashita
sentence.english: I changed our travel schedule.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kao

sentence.kanji: 彼はタオルで顔を拭きました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha taoru de kao wo fukimashita
sentence.english: He wiped his face with a towel.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chairo

sentence.kanji: 彼女は茶色の靴を履いています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha chairo no kutsu wo haite imasu
sentence.english: She's wearing brown shoes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eigo

sentence.kanji: あなたは英語が話せますか。
sentence.romaji: anata ha eigo ga hanasemasu ka
sentence.english: Can you speak English?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakubun

sentence.kanji: 日本語で作文を書きました。
sentence.romaji: nihongo de sakubun wo kakimashita
sentence.english: I wrote an essay in Japanese.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keizai

sentence.kanji: 大学で経済を勉強しました。
sentence.romaji: daigaku de keizai wo benkyou shimashita
sentence.english: I studied economics in college.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's henka

sentence.kanji: 今年は変化の多い年でした。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi ha henka no ooi toshi deshita
sentence.english: There was a lot of change this year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunka

sentence.kanji: 私はこの国の文化を勉強しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kono kuni no bunka wo benkyou shite imasu
sentence.english: I'm studying this country's culture.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hen

sentence.kanji: 変な音が聞こえます。
sentence.romaji: hen na oto ga kikoemasu
sentence.english: I hear a strange sound.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ongaku

sentence.kanji: 私は音楽を聞くのが好きだ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha ongaku wo kiku no ga suki da
sentence.english: I like to listen to music.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kusuri

sentence.kanji: この薬を必ず飲んでください。
sentence.romaji: kono kusuri wo kanarazu nonde kudasai
sentence.english: Please be sure to take this medicine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eiga

sentence.kanji: 彼はよく映画を見ます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yoku eiga wo mimasu
sentence.english: He often watches movies.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ningyou

sentence.kanji: 彼女は人形をたくさん持っています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha ningyou wo takusan mote imasu
sentence.english: She has a lot of dolls.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eigakan

sentence.kanji: 彼と近くの映画館に行きました。
sentence.romaji: kare to chikaku no eigakan ni ikimashita
sentence.english: I went to a nearby movie theater with him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iroiro

sentence.kanji: 彼は色々なことを知っている。
sentence.romaji: kare ha iroiro na koto wo shite iru
sentence.english: He knows about a lot of things.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawaru

sentence.kanji: 信号が青に変わりました。
sentence.romaji: shingou ga ao ni kawarimashita。
sentence.english: The traffic light turned green.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aka

sentence.kanji: 信号が赤に変わりました。
sentence.romaji: shingou ga aka ni kawarimashita
sentence.english: The traffic light changed to red.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tairitsu

sentence.kanji: その2社は対立しています。
sentence.romaji: sono nisha ha tairitsu shite imasu
sentence.english: The two companies are against each other.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hantai

sentence.kanji: 私は反対です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha hantai desu
sentence.english: I'm against it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taisuru

sentence.kanji: その質問に対する答えが見つからなかった。
sentence.romaji: sono shitsumon ni taisuru kotae ga mitsukaranakata
sentence.english: I couldn't find an answer to that question.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuumon

sentence.kanji: レストランでピザを注文しました。
sentence.romaji: resutoran de piza wo chuumon shimashita
sentence.english: I ordered pizza at the restaurant.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maka

sentence.kanji: 彼の顔は真っ赤でした。
sentence.romaji: kare no kao ha maka deshita
sentence.english: His face was red.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sanka

sentence.kanji: 明日は市民マラソンに参加します。
sentence.romaji: asu ha shimin marason ni sanka shimasu
sentence.english: I'll participate in the citizens' marathon tomorrow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuuri

sentence.kanji: 車を修理に出した。
sentence.romaji: kuruma wo shuuri ni dashita
sentence.english: I took the car in for repair.
